_comment1: Parameters controlling conversion of process controls into an ERF color model, plus debugging/graphical outputs, to be supplied by TA1/TA2

tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment1: the rdf:about field is a URI that persistently identifies this run configuration
tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment2: Compatible TASBE interface version, following Semantic Versioning (semver.org).  Note that underspecifying version allows use of backward compatible upgrades.
tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment3: identifier linking to the process control data set to be run
tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment4: For each channel, the species and how to process and display it

channel_parameters._comment1: name must match a channel from the cytometer configuration
channel_parameters.name: FITC-A
channel_parameters._comment2: a persistent URI linking to the actual species being quantified
channel_parameters._comment3: Nickname for the species for charts
channel_parameters.label: EYFP
channel_parameters._comment5: primary color for lines on certain plots

tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment5: Other processing parameters, to be exposed
tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment7: Which channel is being used for unit calibration
tasbe_color_model_parameters._comment8: additional parameters controlling data processing and output
